release_notes:
- Version 2.2.4 Release

- Player friend markers show in what floor they are at
- Some fixes to friends markers such as switching colors and others
- Many improvements on the mobile version, tooltips, performance and more
- Improvements on mini items tracker search bar, it is easier to search for stuff
- Improvements on the quest tree to be more functional and useful
- Market feature is now back to the automatic trader timers from data
- Many other small fixes that you probably never experienced
